p: It is important to note that IL-1 can be detected in the sera of mouse models of cytokine storm; however, correlation with the serum levels of IL-1 and disease severity has not been described for COVID-19 patients. The sensitivity and sensibility of currently available ELISA kits for human IL-1 are being validated. Gene expression and single-cell RNAseq data suggest that a signature related to NF-ÎºB pathway and possibly inflammasome activation might be present [25].
